item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 11, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. DeepScaleR: Surpassing O1-Preview with a 1.5B Model by Scaling RL (180 points | 73 comments)

29. Get in loser. We're rewinding the stack (69 points | 11 comments)
